options.name: options
available_options: allowedOrigins (å€¼: None) - Comma-separated list of URLs allowed for cross-origin non-preflight requests. Use * (default) to allow all origins.
allowFileUploads (å€¼: None) - Whether to allow file uploads in the chat
allowedFilesMimeTypes (å€¼: None) - Allowed file types for upload. Comma-separated list of MIME types.
inputPlaceholder (å€¼: None) - Shown as placeholder text in the chat input field
loadPreviousSession (å€¼: None) - If loading messages of a previous session should be enabled
showWelcomeScreen (å€¼: None) - Whether to show the welcome screen at the start of the chat
getStarted (å€¼: None) - Shown as part of the welcome screen, in the middle of the chat window
subtitle (å€¼: None) - Shown at the top of the chat, under the title
title (å€¼: None) - Shown at the top of the chat
customCss (å€¼: None) - Override default styling of the public chat interface with CSS
responseMode (å€¼: None) - When and how to respond to the chat
responseMode (å€¼: None) - When and how to respond to the webhook
